rinki sahodariyata aththe itha keti kes kalambaaki.gond bhashawata anuwa eya bob kat ekaki.eya age nirbhayathwaya pennum karayi.manda mehi bob kat ekak sahitha wima yanu maoowadi wimaki.dutu thana warenthu rahithawa mara damima sadaha polisiyata eya uwamanawatath wada wadi sakshiyaki.2005 rinkige gammanayata naga bataliyanaya saha salwa judumaya kada waduna athara ee kalaye aya game militari anshaye wada karamin sitiyaya.age mithuriyan wu sukki ha lukkida esema wiya.mowuhu siyallo mahila sangamayeda samajikathwaya daruha.gama ginibath kala ikbithi bataliyanaya lukki ha sukkiwa allagath athara thawath dariyaka da athulu owun thidenama ranchu gasi dushanaya kala sebalu ikbithi owun mara dammaha."owunwa dushanaya karanawa mata dakinna labuna.eeka une thanakola gollak uda"rinki kiyayi."
